title: Families: alike and different
creator_credit: James Kennedy, Jane Treiman, George McQuilkin and Churchill Films
brief_description: Compares the daily activities of three families from Japan, Mexico and the United States as told by the children. Shows the settings in which they live: a crowded Tokyo home, the San Francisco hills and the expansive rural three house compound of Yasalon.
